sys_properties.description: Allows unauthenticated users to choose and view content in their preferred language. This property contains a list of service portal record sys ids separated by commas. For any portal record specified in this property, the language picker will be visible in the portal header after the 'language selector' widget is added to its header.
sys_properties.name: x_liisa_support_ca.glide.sp.portals.language_selector_enabled

sys_update_version.name: sys_properties_797f2aae1bbde910c2e1433be54bcbb3
